313 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
314 // Constraint object to assert that a type T is derived from B.
315 // The check occurs at compilation-time, and no code is generated.
316 template< class T, class B > struct Derived_from
317 {
318  static void constraints(T* p) { B* pb = p; (void) pb; }
319  Derived_from() { void(*p)(T*) = constraints; (void) p; }
320 };
321 
323 template <typename NodeScore>
324 class plEdgeScoreFromNodeScore: public plEdgeScore
325  , private Derived_from<NodeScore, plNodeScore>
326 {
327 public:
328  plFloat operator()(const plSymbol& A, const plSymbol& B) const PL_OVERRIDE
329  {
330  // std::cout << __PRETTY_FUNCTION__ << ": "
331  // << nscore_(B, A^conditioning_variables_) << " - " << nscore_(B, conditioning_variables_) << " = "
332  // << nscore_(B, A^conditioning_variables_) - nscore_(B, conditioning_variables_)
333  // << " "
334  // << nscore_(A, B^conditioning_variables_) << " - " << nscore_(A, conditioning_variables_) << " = "
335  // << nscore_(A, B^conditioning_variables_) - nscore_(A, conditioning_variables_)
336  // << std::endl;
340  //return nscore_(B, A^conditioning_variables_) - nscore_(B, conditioning_variables_);
341  return nscore_(A, B^conditioning_variables_) - nscore_(A, conditioning_variables_);
342  }
343 
344  plFloat operator()(const plSymbol& A, const plSymbol& B,
345  const plVariablesConjunction& C) const PL_OVERRIDE
346  {
347  //return nscore_(B, A^C) - nscore_(B, C);
348  return nscore_(A, B^C) - nscore_(A, C);
349  }
350 
351  using plEdgeScore::operator();
352 
353 protected:
354  explicit plEdgeScoreFromNodeScore(const NodeScore& nscore)
355  : plEdgeScore()
356  , nscore_(nscore)
357  {}
358 
359  plEdgeScoreFromNodeScore(const NodeScore& nscore, const plVariablesConjunction &conditioning_variables)
360  : plEdgeScore(conditioning_variables)
361  , nscore_(nscore)
362  {}
363 
364  NodeScore nscore_;
365 };
366 
367 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
370 class plEdgeScoreAIC
371  : public plEdgeScoreFromNodeScore<plNodeScoreAIC >
372 {
373  typedef plNodeScoreAIC NodeScore;
374  typedef plEdgeScoreFromNodeScore<NodeScore> Base;
375 public:
381  explicit plEdgeScoreAIC(plDataDescriptor& data_desc)
382  : Base(NodeScore(data_desc)) {}
383 
390  plEdgeScoreAIC(plDataDescriptor& data_desc, const plVariablesConjunction &conditioning_variables)
391  : Base(NodeScore(data_desc), conditioning_variables) {}
392 };
393
